Html:
EDB to PST Converter software is a capable application to repair damage EDB file and convert EDB to PST, EML, MSG or HTML formats. With the assistance of EDB PST converter software you can efficiently extract single selected EDB emails according to dates-(from date-to date) and transfer EDB to PST without making any changes. It allows you to migrate EDB to PST along with email properties, emails body content, email header information etc. It wonderfully convert EDB file into PST file in least time.

Get more information :- http://www.edbtopst-converter.com/
